article.title: NAFTA Rules of Origin
article.summary: Learn how to use the Harmonized Code system and what to do when foreign components are included in your product which triggers using the Rules of Origin.
article.content:
NAFTA Rules of Origin

NAFTA Rules of Origin are crucial for qualifying your products for the duty-free benefit. This video shows you how to use the Harmonized Code system and what to do when foreign components are included in your product which triggers using the Rules of Origin.

For further questions, call 1-800-USA-TRAD E.

Related Files

  • Regional Value Content Formula (Word, PDF)
article.seometadatadescription: Learn how to use the Harmonized Code system and what to do when foreign components are included in your product which triggers using the Rules of Origin.
article.seometadatakeyword: NAFTA, rules of origin, export training, webinar, Harmonized Code
